description: ALTERATIONS TO THE FRONT ELEVATION INCLUDING A TWO-STOREY BAY WINDOW AND A FIRST FLOOR REAR EXTENSION OVER EXISTING GROUND FLOOR REAR EXTENSION.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The developments to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The facing materials to be used for the external surfaces of the building/extension hereby approved shall be those specified in the approved drawing number 597/09A and the applicants letter dated 28/01/00 unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning General Permitted Development Order 1995 (or any other Order revoking or re-enacting this Order) no windows or other openings shall be formed in the south elevation of the first floor rear extension without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The roof of the extension or flat roofed areas hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden, sitting out area or for any other purpose of a similar nature without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - INFORMATIVE:  You are advised that this permission does not include the rear roof extension shown on the approved drawing. If you consider that this work constitutes 'permitted development' you should consider submitting an application for a Certificate of Lawfulness.
